name: Winter's empty mask - Boss Rush
detailed_description:
Boss rush

The new content adds an additional game mode, which has no effect on the story, and also new images to unlock in the extras section.

Game mode

►The "Boss Rush" mode will be unlocked when you get all the game's endings.
►Defeat all bosses in "original" difficulty consecutively while avoiding your life bar to reach zero.
►You'll recover life and ki after defeating each boss.
►Accumulate up to 20 pts in the Super Bar. To use the Special Attack only -10 pts of Super is required (you can exceed the 10 pts of the super bar).
►Use "Regeneration" to increase +1500 pts life (you can exceed the 3000 pts of the life bar), at the cost of -500 pts of ki
►Use "Super Attack" to inflict maximum damage to the enemy, while recovering the entire ki bar

Extra Gallery

►Access the extra gallery, by clicking on "Images" and then on the tab with the number 2
►6 images will be unlocked by default.
►1 image will be unlocked if you defeat all the bosses in original difficulty in the same "walk-through" (Story mode).
►9 images will be unlocked if you get all the game's endings.
►2 images will be unlocked if you win the "Boss Rush."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: 1.66
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes battles, murders and also death ends for the player. While most of them are a black screen with narration on it, some images might disturb people sensitive to such things.
